description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Marcus Clarke Memorial Volume, containing selections from the writings of Marcus Clarke, together with Lord Rosebery's letter, etc., and a biography of the deceased author. Compiled and edited by Hamilton Mackinnon. [With a portrait.]" Author: Clarke, Marcus Andrew Hislop Contributor: MACKINNON, Hamilton. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12273.aaa.22." Page: 120 Place of Publishing: Melbourne Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Cameron, Laing & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000715501 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
